arts.ttl: Chelsea 18-year-old 'in five-club transfer battle' amid bitter contract dispute
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain reportedly step up their interest in signing Chelsea contract rebel Josh Acheampong, who has been frozen out of Enzo Maresca's team.

arts.ttl: Forgotten former Chelsea star guilty of SHOCKING miss - as fans are left baffled by his blunder
arts.sum: Galatasaray had the opportunity to double their lead when Victor Osimhen ran through on goal before laying it to the former Blues winger, who missed from close-range .

arts.ttl: 'On fire': Jamie O'Hara raves about Chelsea player who's 'proving people wrong' after display in Leicester win
arts.sum: Chelsea secured another victory on the road by winning away at Leicester City this weekend. It’s extremely congested in this season’s Premier League table, but...

arts.ttl: 'He was brilliant': Joe Cole claims Leicester couldn't get near Chelsea player on Saturday
arts.sum: Joe Cole believes one Chelsea player was a class above Leicester City in Saturday’s game at the King Power Stadium. Chelsea left the East Midlands...

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca forced this Chelsea star out, now he’s got more assists than their other attackers put together
arts.sum: Chelsea have made a positive start to life under Enzo Maresca but the new Blues boss may have made a mistake in allowing Raheem Sterling to leave Stamford Bridge for Arsenal during the summer. It was decided during pre-season that the 29-year-old would not be part of Maresca’s plans at Chelsea and the Italian coach […] The post Enzo Maresca forced this Chelsea star out, now he’s got more assists than their other attackers put together appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: 'Very happy': Enzo Maresca raves about how good Chelsea player was off the ball vs Leicester
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca is full of praise for one Chelsea star after Saturday’s performance against Leicester City, especially because of his hard work out of possession....

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca gives verdict on nasty tackle on Cole Palmer
arts.sum: Cole Palmer saw his Achilles raked by the studs of Wilfred Ndidi during Chelsea's 2-1 win over Leicester.

arts.ttl: Chelsea see off a poor Leicester City 2-1 to stay third in the Premier League
arts.sum: Chelsea should have scored on 54 minutes when another quick break saw a Jackson shot parried away by Hermansen, but Cole Palmer’s follow-up shot, on target at the far post smacked off the legs of Noni who was in the way and the ball went for a goal kick. Goals from Nicolas Jackson and Enzo, one in each half saw Chelsea retain third place in the Premier League with deserved 2-1 away to Leicester City.

arts.ttl: Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca hits back at Harry Kane criticism after Cole Palmer plays 90 minutes
arts.sum: Harry Kane was critical of the nine players who pulled out of England duty last week and Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca has responded to his comments, with Cole Palmer among those who withdrew from the squad

arts.ttl: Jackson silencing doubters - but can Chelsea maintain form?
arts.sum: After a goal and assist against Leicester, Nicolas Jackson is showing why he can be the top-class striker to lead Chelsea towards a trophy this season.
